name: We Must Clear
description:
Get rid of all zombies.

You are deployed near some woods and fields. Zombies keep coming out from everywhere. Shoot them, search for loot, find other shooters who will help you. Clear sectors to get more ammo and cars. See how long can you survive.

How to play

Download the Zip and run .exe file.

Press Q to show or hide "HowToPlay" panel.

Kill zombies. Watch map (press C). If the sector on map turns blue, clear 3 more in square (2x2) to receive reward - Car or Ammo.

Use Cars to travel faster. Every spawned Car has limited fuel which can't be refilled. Car drives slower through fields and woods, it's best to keep it on the road. You can also use Car to run over Zombies.

Ammo and other Soldiers are placed all over the world. 

My first published game

It's my first published game, made in Godot Engine, in 1 month.
It may have bugs, glitches, there could be a lot more features in it, but I rather treated it as a project to learn gamedev than a serious game. 
It was made in Godot 3.4, and I hope my next project will be made in 4.0 :)
